scripts.test-all: yarn build && yarn test:mixinproxy && yarn test:config && yarn test
scripts.test:allow: yarn build:allow && ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_allow
scripts.test:hello: yarn build:hello && ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_hello
scripts.test:inlineaction: yarn build:inlineaction && ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_action
scripts.test:counter: yarn build:counter && ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_counter
scripts.test:singleton: yarn build:singleton && ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_singleton
scripts.test:codegeneration: yarn build:codegeneration && ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_codegeneration
scripts.test:notify: yarn build:sender && yarn build:receiver && ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_notify
scripts.test:eosio.token: yarn build:eosio.token && ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_token
scripts.test:escrow: yarn build:escrow && ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_escrow
scripts.test:balance: yarn build:balance && yarn build:receiver && ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_balance
scripts.test:finalizer: yarn build:finalizer && ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_finalizer
